title: Anyone using Dell Color Laser printers out here?
content:
Hi all,

I am looking for a color laser printer that will allow me to produce high quality proofs of my work on A4 before i send off to the printer.

I am looking at Dells range of laser printers, I see they all do 600x600dpi any other designers out there got any experience with their printers?

Any help would be cool
author: TF22Raptor

comments.content:
I'm using a Dell 3110cn. I would say the printer is adequate, but not stellar.

It's economical to operate, but I find the text is a bit spindly, and I can't seem to find any way to adjust the print density the way I could with my old LaserJet.
